name: Midi Monster
description:
Trapped in a recording studio, you must escape a monster that you can hear but cannot see!

Made in Unity for the Snowed In Game Jam 2020.

Headphones recommended.

Credits:

  • Clément Todd - Designer
  • Tom Hansen - Musical Programmer and Musician
  • Ian Wark - Programmer
  • Joel Faubert - Programmer

Known Issues:

  • Game will crash if you do not have any audio output devices connected (you need speakers or headphones plugged into your computer).
